website_summaries.verdict: A home unit that is heavy-duty enough to match commercial models.
cons: On-off switch is made from plastic

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: My 15 year old no-name Chinese 21 gallon compressor caught fire one day while using it, so I was suddenly in the market for a new compressor. You can get a comparable unit for a little less, but then you have to go pick it up; this bad boy comes with Prime delivery! It comes very well packed. Hook up is easy, and it's VERY quiet. This was a fantastic purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ian MacBride

customer_reviews.title: Quiet!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Very quiet. Fills quickly. Well built except for on/off switch. Price just jumped tremendously though. 3/25/18 I paid $699 now 4/30/18 it is $771.
customer_reviews.author: Thunderwolf90

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: This compressor is super quite compared to any others I’ve worked with, and fills up quick enough for my needs, I am using it in a home garage, impressed it is actually American made
customer_reviews.author: Josh Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Motor fried
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this air compressor in November of 2018. The motor has fried 4 months after warranty expired. I installed the compressor per manufacturers instructions. it is wired correctly to a 220V outlet. Disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Scott

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Attached to tiny, flimsy pallet that failed while in transit with XPO freight. Compressor toppled and this cracked the cylinder head, and crushed the safety cage. XPO ignored this damage when they righted the compressor, and attempted delivery. Reordered in hopes that second one will arrive intact.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and well made.
customer_reviews.text: When we needed a new compressor for the shop we wanted to upgrade from 110v 20 gal. This compressor not only is three times the size but also much quieter then it’s predecessor. Still working through the break in period on this unit but so far we are thoroughly impressed with it. If there are any issues I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B.

customer_reviews.title: Great air compressor for the price tag
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy. Plenty of air to run my grinders, ratchets, and sand blaster. The pressure switch was damaged in shipping, but a quick call to Puma, about 2 minutes on hold, and they shipped a new one out right away. So far, happy with the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Yoakley

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This air compressor is great. I use it for simple things like tires, and impact wrenches, to air nailers, pretty much every AIR need I have. It's smooth, doesn't sound too loud, and I like it. I would recommend this Air Compressor!
customer_reviews.author: AJT

customer_reviews.title: Quite for this size
customer_reviews.text: It's quite fills up quick... You will need to have an electrician wire it up.... I don't like how the on and off switch is plastic... I can shut it off on the breaker panel 😁
customer_reviews.author: jose rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing so far
customer_reviews.text: Amazing so far. It has only been a few days but it works amazingly. Shipped on pallets and wrapped, there was no damage during shipping, which I was happy about. Bought some cable from home depot and fired it up. Make sure to break it in, follow the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great compressor. Very nicely priced and works just as well as ones twice the price. Pressure gauge was broken but a cheap simple part to replace and didn’t bother me. Gets used a lot for painting and bodywork and has done all that’s been asked no problem.
customer_reviews.author: bobber

customer_reviews.title: Good compressor
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this compressor, had my choice narrowed down to 3 of them. Choose this one basically because of the free lift gate delivery. I use it for a tire machine and a few air tools. It’s fairly quite
customer_reviews.author: Deb Askildson

customer_reviews.title: Why the motor does not pump air to tank the motor work and stop and no air in the tank
customer_reviews.text: I got problem with the motor the motor it does not work perfectly I recommend all people do not buy this project
customer_reviews.author: Sarmad Hasan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing item great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best compressor I have ever owned! It is super quiet and very strong. Runs great and I use it in my home garage and it shares a wall with the basement and I can not hear it when it kicks off inside It sounds great!
customer_reviews.author: Aron

customer_reviews.title: but compressor works good and is surprisingly quiet
customer_reviews.text: Package came damaged...but compressor works good and is surprisingly quiet...
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Colley

customer_reviews.title: Very well built unit, produces pressure quickly and efficiently ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well built unit, produces pressure quickly and efficiently. Come shipped full of oil and with a ball valve on the air outlet. Definitely high quality and seems built to last.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have used this compressor for just about everything I am really really impressed by it.
customer_reviews.author: Phil D'Grave

product_meta.title: Puma Industries PK-6060V Air Compressor, Professional/Commercial Single Stage Belt Drive Series, 3 hp Running, 135 Maximum psi, 230/1V/Phase, 60 gal, 305 lb.
product_meta.description: This Puma Industries, Air Compressor, model PK-6060V, Professional/Commercial is a Single Stage Belt Drive Series, and specifications are: 3 HP Running, 135 Max PSI, 230/1 Voltage/Phase, 60 Gallons, 305 lbs. Its features include: Oil lubricated, single stage cast iron pump, Portable units feature built-in pressure regulator and quick coupler for pressure control of outlet air, 1/2" outlet ball valve and 1/4" drain ball valve on 60 gallon vertical tank, Single Phase induction motors with overload protection, steel wheels with ball bearing and no flat tires for best mobility.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
